explains: n. 免下车餐馆；免下车电影院
adj. 免下车的；路边服务的

sentences.en: We stopped at a drive-in for a hamburger.
sentences.cn: 我们在一家“免下车”餐馆停下来吃汉堡包。

sentences.en: They had run their own businesses for years, first a theater, then a barbecue restaurant, and then another drive-in.
sentences.cn: 他们经营自己的生意多年，先是电影院，再是烧烤餐厅，然后又开了汽车餐厅。

sentences.en: The bus sometimes stops at a drive-in.
sentences.cn: 有时候这巴士停留在简易餐馆。
